articles.description: For the first time in the history of the College Football Playoff, BYU found itself in the CFP rankings Tuesday night, coming in at No. 14. There was little celebrating, though.
articles.content: For the first time in the history of the College Football Playoff, BYU found itself in the CFP rankings Tuesday night, when the initial 2020 rankings were unveiled and the Cougars came in at No. 14.… [+12012 chars]
